headline: Linde Names CEO Sanjiv Lamba as Chairman, Succeeds Retiring Steve Angel; Appoints Sean Durbin as COO
summary: Linde (NASDAQ:LIN) is one of the best NASDAQ stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On September 29, Linde announced that its Board of Directors has appointed Sanjiv Lamba, the current Chief Executive Officer, to the additional role of Chairman of the Board, effective January 31, 2026. Lamba will succeed Steve Angel, who plans to […]
